name: Bell State
description: Creates a basic Bell state (maximally entangled state) between two qubits. Expected outcome: Equal probability of measuring '00' and '11' (binary 0 and 3 in decimal).

name: GHZ State
description: Creates a Greenberger-Horne-Zeilinger (GHZ) state among three qubits. Expected outcome: Equal probability of measuring '000' and '111' (binary 0 and 7 in decimal).

name: W State
description: Creates a W state among three qubits, which is another type of entangled state. Expected outcome: Equal probability of measuring '001', '010', and '100' (binary 1, 2, and 4 in decimal).

name: Quantum Fourier Transform - 4 Qubits
description: Implements a 4-qubit Quantum Fourier Transform which is fundamental to many quantum algorithms. Expected outcome: Complex distribution across all possible states.

name: Grover's Algorithm - 3 Qubits
description: Implements Grover's search algorithm to find the marked state '101'. Expected outcome: High probability of measuring the state '101' (binary 5 in decimal).

expected_results.unique_outcomes: Several, with state '5' (101) having the highest probability
expected_results.distribution: State '5' (101) should have significantly higher probability than others

name: Error Case - Missing Measurement
description: Circuit without any measurement operations. Expected outcome: Error indicating that measurement operations are missing.

name: Error Case - Syntax Error
description: Circuit with a syntax error (missing semicolon). Expected outcome: Error indicating a syntax issue.

expected_results.message: Syntax error related to missing semicolon

name: Error Case - Invalid Register Reference
description: Circuit referencing a non-existent qubit. Expected outcome: Error indicating an invalid register reference.

expected_results.message: Error about out-of-range index for register

name: Medium Complexity - Quantum Teleportation
description: Implements the quantum teleportation protocol. Expected outcome: The state of the first qubit is teleported to the third qubit.

expected_results.distribution: Final state of qubit 2 should match the initial state of qubit 0

name: High Complexity - 12-Qubit Circuit
description: A complex circuit with 12 qubits and multiple operations. Expected outcome: Highly entangled state with a complex measurement distribution.

name: Very High Complexity - 16-Qubit Circuit
description: An extremely complex circuit with 16 qubits designed to stress-test the simulator. Expected outcome: Will take significant time to simulate.
